name: Croatian Screenwriters & Playwrights Guild
description: The challenge was to design and build an elegant informational website. Our solution was to use Next.js as the frontend and storyblok CMS as the headless backend in order to serve a clean and simple information architecture.

name: Infodesign
description: The challenge was to showcase services and expertise of the business. Our solution was to use Progress Sitefinity CMS and a custom design system based on Bootstrap to create an aesthetically pleasing corporate website.

The challenge was to redesign their website to better showcase their work and services. Our solution was to use Nuxt on the frontend toghther with markdown. Key differentiation was using canvas shader animation.
